Changelog
=========

0.1.3 (2011-06-29)
------------------
#. More forcefull supervisor update.

0.1.2 (2011-06-28)
------------------

0.1.1 (2011-06-20)
------------------
#. Added command line git creds supply.

0.1.0
-----
#. deploy_latest_tag option added.
#. Fail on init.d issues.

0.0.9

0.0.8

0.0.7

0.0.6

0.0.5
-----
#. Added newest and verbose options.

0.0.3
-----

0.0.2
